product_details.product_story: Power through your training regime in the TAD Pocket Women's 7/8 Training Tights from PUMA. Plus the slip pockets ensure that you have easy access to your stash of essentials.Designed for comfortable wear for sports and street-style, PUMA apparels are always fun to wear. Upgrade in style with wide range of apparels form the worlds leading and much-loved sports brand, PUMA.
